text: Elihu Condemns Job
Moreover,\f + \fr 35:1 \ft Hebrew “And” \f* Elihu ⸤spoke up⸥\f + \fr 35:1 \ft Literally “answered”; see NET \f* and said,
“Do you think this \add is\add* justice when you say,
‘⸤I am right⸥\f + \fr 35:2 \ft Literally “My righteousness” \f* before God’?
If you ask what it profits you:
‘How do I benefit ⸤by refraining from my sin⸥?’\f + \fr 35:3 \ft Literally “from my sin” \f*
I myself\f + \fr 35:4 \ft Emphatic personal pronoun \f* ⸤will give answer to you⸥\f + \fr 35:4 \ft Literally “will return you words” \f*
and \add to\add* your friends with you.
“Look at \add the\add* heavens, and see;
and observe \add the\add* clouds \add that\add* are higher than you.
If you have sinned, what do you accomplish against him?
And \add if\add* your transgressions are multiplied, what do you do to him?
If you are righteous, what do you give to him,
or what does he receive from your hand?
Your wickedness \add affects\add* a person like yourself,
and your righteousness \add affects\add* humans.
“Because of \add the\add* multitude of oppressions, they cry out;
they cry for help because of \add the\add* arm of \add the\add* mighty.
But\f + \fr 35:10 \ft Hebrew “And” \f* no one says, ‘Where \add is\add* God my Maker,
\add who\add* gives songs in the night,
\add who\add* teaches us more than \add the\add* animals of \add the\add* earth
and makes us wiser than the birds of the heavens?’
There they cry out, but\f + \fr 35:12 \ft Hebrew “and” \f* he does not answer
⸤because of the pride of evildoers⸥.\f + \fr 35:12 \ft Literally “from \fq the \ft face of \fq the \ft pride of evildoers” \f*
“Surely God does not hear an empty plea,
and Shaddai does not regard it.
⸤How much less⸥\f + \fr 35:14 \ft Literally “Also for” \f* \add when\add* you say \add that\add* you do not see him,
that \add the\add* case \add is\add* ⸤before him⸥,\f + \fr 35:14 \ft Literally “to the face of him” \f* and you are waiting for him!
But\f + \fr 35:15 \ft Hebrew “And” \f* now, because his anger does not punish,
and he does not acknowledge the transgression at all,
⸤therefore⸥\f + \fr 35:16 \ft Hebrew “and,” or “so” \f* Job opens his mouth in empty talk—
without knowledge he multiplies words.”
